segments.text: I can't believe how calm everything seems despite the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she hasn't noticed a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the water is just pouring over the sink, and she doesn't react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what's going through her mind that she's so distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, and it's amazing he hasn't fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a miracle the woman hasn't turned around and caught them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just full of surprises, and I can't look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm on the edge of my seat, wondering what will happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR
